SEARCH
Package com.ecoguard.ecoguard.repository

Interface DeviceCommandRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<DeviceCommand,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<DeviceCommand,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<DeviceCommand,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<DeviceCommand,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<DeviceCommand,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<DeviceCommand>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<DeviceCommand,Long>
@Repository public interface DeviceCommandRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<DeviceCommand,Long>
Repository interface for device command persistence operations.

Provides methods for querying commands by device key, execution status, and command type.

Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • findByDeviceKeyAndExecutedFalseOrderByCreatedAtAsc

      List<DeviceCommand> findByDeviceKeyAndExecutedFalseOrderByCreatedAtAsc(String deviceKey)
      Finds pending (unexecuted) commands for a device, ordered by creation time.
      Parameters:
      deviceKey - the device key to filter by
      Returns:
      list of pending commands, oldest first

    • findByIdAndDeviceKey

      Optional<DeviceCommand> findByIdAndDeviceKey(Long id, String deviceKey)
      Finds a command by ID and device key.
      Parameters:
      id - the command ID
      deviceKey - the device key
      Returns:
      Optional containing the command if found, or empty

    • findTopByCommandTypeOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      Optional<DeviceCommand> findTopByCommandTypeOrderByCreatedAtDesc(String commandType)
      Finds the most recent command of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      commandType - the command type to filter by
      Returns:
      Optional containing the most recent command of the type, or empty

    • findTop10ByDeviceKeyOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      List<DeviceCommand> findTop10ByDeviceKeyOrderByCreatedAtDesc(String deviceKey)
      Finds the 10 most recent commands for a device.
      Parameters:
      deviceKey - the device key to filter by
      Returns:
      list of the 10 most recent commands, newest first
